oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |han≠kass'o identifies and describes various insects (and some animals) found in Bushmanland. 1) p.7817opp: (26 August 1879) additional notes on insects provided by |han≠kass'o, 2) p.7820v: the ≠go (an animal found in Bushmanland), 3) This story is found in Book VIII-21.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Names of insects and notes on some of them (at the South African Museum)
